== DarrylClarke ==

* Debian user since 2000.
* I love Ubuntu.
* <nowiki>[[http://darrylclarke.com/|Darryl Clarke's home Page]]</nowiki>

=== Systems ===
I currently have 2 production machines running Breezy) 1 Machine running Dapper. I intend to upgrade my Debian Woody systems eventually.

=== Home Server ===
AMD Athlon XP 2000+, 1024MB Ram, 2x80GB (mirrored) system, 2x80GB (mirrored) home, 4x 200GB Drives for random storage, Leadtek Winfast TV2000 card, nVidia TNT2 Video.

=== Desktop ===
AMD X2 3800+ Dual Core CPU, 1024MB Ram, 20 GB System, Pioneer 16x DVDRW, GeForce 6800GS PCI-Express card, Gigabyte A8N-SLI nForce4 Motherboard, home is mounted via nfs.

=== Diskless Terminal ===
Intel P3 1Ghz, 512MB, onboard video, No disks, network boots from my server and using the Ubuntu LTSP packages.

=== Laptop ===
Compaq Presario 2190ca (HardwareSupportMachinesLaptopsCompaq); AMD Athlon XP-M 2400+, 768MB, 40GB Disk, CD-RW/DVDROM, intel 2200 Pro wireless, ATI Mobile Radeon U1 (320M) Video.
